§ 30101. Prior authorization of appropriations required Notwithstanding the provisions of any other law, no appropriation may be made to the Administration unless previously authorized by legislation enacted by Congress. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3357.)
